setting.minSampleNum: Minimum number of samples (0 means disabled)

sync.cloudSyncReadme: When the sync code is empty, clicking "Backup" will generate a sync code and backup the current preset, inputs and planner stage selections to the server. Enter the sync code on other devices to restore the data.
sync.apiKeyReadme: The API Key is not required, but if the API call reaches the limit, please go to ExtendsClass to register an account and fill in the API Key here. Each API Key can only read or modify the data corresponding to the sync code created by the API Key.
sync.localBackupReadme: This is a legacy backup method which can be used for local temporary backup. Backup code must be saved in order to restore your data.
sync.autoSyncUploadTip: Auto Upload: Backup to cloud upon input (and every 5s). Your data won't be restored automatically for security reasons, please click the button manually to restore them.

plannerSetting.title: Planner Settings
plannerSetting.excludedStageNumber: No stage has been excluded | {n} stage has been excluded | {n} stages have been excluded

snackbar.importFailed: Import failed, please check your code.
snackbar.syncCodeInvalid: Sync code is invalid, please delete it and regenerate one.
snackbar.penguinDataFailed: Update failed, please check your connection.

todos.tips: Tips: Click the to-do items to mark it as completed, and at the same time, the corresponding materials will be automatically deducted and the preset data will be modified. Click items which can not be completed will highlight related materials.

multiAccount.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete the account "{0}"?
